articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: How cold Las Vegas conditions will test F1's engineers - Autosport
articles.description: The cold conditions expected when the cars take to the track on Thursday evening in Las Vegas are set to provide Formula 1 teams with an intriguing challenge.
articles.content: Not only do they have to ensure they can get the three Pirelli compounds to work effectively, but the unusually low temperatures will also have a significant impact on overall car cooling, and hence … [+7813 chars]
